Smartphone Advan Nasa Meluncur dengan Desain Keren
06 Nov 2019, 20:19 by Uji Sukma Medianti - detikInet


Foto: Advan

Jakarta - Smartphone lokal Advan resmi meluncurkan Advan Nasa. Smartphone terbaru dengan jargon 'Social Media Hero' ini membawa teknologi smartphone entry level ke tingkat yang lebih tinggi. Hadir dengan tiga pilihan warna yakni Bright Blue, Dark Black dan Green, Advan Nasa akan tersedia secara Online di Shopee & Tokopedia Flash Sale pada 11-11-2019 dijual dengan harga Rp 749.000.Advan Nasa hadir dengan membawa teknologi yang menawarkan pengalaman internet terbaik bagi konsumen. Dikemas dengan layar IPS dengan kualitas layar jernih dan peranti lunak multi-tasking kebanggaan anak negeri, IDOS 9S.12 berbasis Android 9 Pie, Advan Nasa akan memberikan akses ke layanan media sosial seperti Facebook, Twitter, Instagram hingga Instant Messaging dengan lancar. Dengan Advan Nasa, harapannya siapa pun bisa menjadi hero dengan social media."Advan Nasa (hadir) untuk masyarakat Indonesia dan para milenial yang punya hobi di media sosial. Tampil dengan layar tajam, desain elegan dan tipis nyaman di genggam, Advan Nasa akan menjadikan siapa pun sebagai hero dengan social media," ujar GM Marketing Advan Aria Wahyudi dalam keterangan tertulis, Rabu (6/11/2019).Teknologi kamera 5MP yang didukung AF dan aperture F2.2 pada Advan Nasa, sangat mendukung kegiatan fotografi mobile. Hasil foto bisa langsung dibagikan ke social media dengan cepat. Advan Nasa juga memanjakan para pecinta selfie dengan menghadirkan kamera 2MP, yang dilengkapi fitur Beauty.Advan Nasa membawa sistem keamanan perangkat yang cukup baik. Teknologi Face ID mampu mendeteksi titik-titik wajah dengan akurat, dan bisa membuka kunci layar dengan cepat dan tanpa hambatan.Ponsel ini didukung prosesor dan kartu grafis yang mumpuni. CPU Quad-core 1.4GHz, yang dikombinasikan dengan RAM 2GB dan Internal memory 16GB mampu menghadirkan pengalaman bermain game tanpa hambatan dengan 10 Touch Point.Berbicara mengenai desain, Advan Nasa mengadopsi konsep 2.5D yang menawarkan detail bodi menawan dan tetap nyaman digunakan. Dimensinya tidak terlalu besar, dengan ketebalan hanya sekitar 0,85cm. Cukup tipis untuk ukuran smartphone masa kini. Fashion glaring color yang diterapkan pada bodi Advan Nasa menggunakan merek cat bertaraf internasional, juga dikombinasikan dengan semprotan warna klasik yang mampu menghadirkan nuansa mewah di smartphone entry level.Desain depan Advan Nasa tampil keren dengan layar IPS berukuran 5.2 inci dan resolusi qHD 960x540 pixels. Layar ini memiliki color gamut yang lebih komplit. Mampu menghadirkan warna yang lebih tajam dan akurat, layaknya warna asli dengan tampilan penuh. Highlight display di Advan Nasa juga mampu menyajikan tayangan konten smartphone yang tetap jernih, meski terpapar langsung cahaya kuat atau sinar matahari. Konsumen akan merasa nyaman dan betah berlama-lama menikmati sosial media di Advan Nasa.Advan Nasa tersedia di Official Store Advan Shopee dan Tokopedia, mulai tanggal 11 November 2019.(ujm/fay)
text:
Advan Nasa Smartphone Launches with a Cool Design
06 Nov 2019, 20:19 by Sukma Medianti Test - detikInet


Photo: Advan

Jakarta - Advan local smartphone officially launched Advan Nasa. The latest smartphone with the jargon 'Social Media Hero' brings smartphone technology entry level to a higher level. Comes with three color choices namely Bright Blue, Dark Black and Green, Advan Nasa will be available online at Shopee & Tokopedia Flash Sale on 11-11-2019 for Rp 749,000. Advan Nasa comes with technology that offers the best internet experience for consumer. Packed with a IPS screen with crystal clear screen quality and multi-tasking software the pride of domestic children, IDOS 9S.12 based on Android 9 Pie, Advan Nasa will provide access to social media services such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram to Instant Messaging smoothly. With Advan Nasa, it is hoped that anyone can become a hero with social media. "Advan Nasa (present) for the people of Indonesia and millennials who have hobbies on social media. Appearing with a sharp screen, elegant and thin design comfortable in handheld, Advan Nasa will make anyone as a hero with social media, "said GM Marketing Advan Aria Wahyudi in a written statement, Wednesday (11/06/2019). 5MP camera technology supported by AF and F2.2 aperture on Advan Nasa, strongly supports mobile photography activities. The photos can be immediately shared to social media quickly. Advan Nasa also spoiled selfie lovers by presenting a 2MP camera, which is equipped with Beauty.Advan Nasa features a pretty good device security system. Face ID technology is able to detect facial points accurately, and can open screen locks quickly and without obstacles. This phone is supported by a capable processor and graphics card. The 1.4GHz Quad-core CPU, combined with 2GB of RAM and 16GB of internal memory is capable of delivering seamless gaming experience with 10 Touch Points. Speaking of design, Advan Nasa adopts the 2.5D concept which offers charming body details and remains comfortable to use. Dimensions are not too large, with a thickness of only about 0.85cm. Thin enough for the size of today's smartphones. Fashion glaring color applied to the body of Advan Nasa uses an international brand of paint, also combined with a classic color spray that is able to bring the feel of luxury on an entry level smartphone. This screen has a more complete color gamut. Able to bring sharper and more accurate colors, like real colors with full display. Highlight display at Advan Nasa is also able to present smartphone content that remains clear, even if exposed to direct strong light or sunlight. Consumers will feel comfortable and at home for long time enjoying social media at Advan Nasa. Advan Nasa is available at the Official Store Advan Shopee and Tokopedia, starting on November 11, 2019. (ujm / fay)
